para.grphcref: Pneumatic Starter - Removal/Installation Figure 80-11-10-991-30200-06-A / SHEET 1 / SHEET 2

warning.para: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU MOVE THE ENGINE STARTER. BECAUSE THE STARTER WEIGHS APPROXIMATELY 38 POUNDS (17 KG), INJURY CAN OCCUR.

caution.para: DURING INSTALLATION, KEEP THE STARTER PERPENDICULAR TO THE AGB MOUNTING PAD TO PREVENT SEIZE AND/OR DAMAGE TO THE OUTPUT DRIVE SHAFT.

DO NOT INSTALL THE STARTER ON THE AGB WITHOUT ITS SEALING ITEMS (NEW O-RING AND THE RE-USED OR NEW SEAL RING). IF THE STARTER IS INSTALLED WITHOUT THESE SEALS, THE ENGINE CAN LEAK OIL. THIS CAN CAUSE ENGINE FAILURE.
DURING INSTALLATION, ADJUST THE ORIENTATION OF THE LOWER DUCT. MAKE SURE THAT THE PS3 LINE DOES NOT TOUCH THE LOWER DUCT OR OTHER PARTS IN THIS AREA. IF IT DOES, CHAFING OF THE PS3 HOSE CAN OCCUR.

DURING STARTER REMOVAL/INSTALLATION, BE CAREFUL NOT TO CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE STARTER FUSE PIN WHEN YOU TURN/TWIST THE STARTER ASSEMBLY IN OPPOSITE CLOCKWISE/COUNTERCLOCKWISE DIRECTIONS FROM THE MOUNTING PAD. CFM RECOMMENDS THAT YOU USE THE CORRECT LEVERAGE PROCEDURES AND CORRECT TOOLS TO REMOVE/INSTALL THE STARTER ASSEMBLY FROM/ON THE AGB.

l2item.para: Lubricate the new 80111001-060 O-ring50 with CP2442engine oil and install in groove of starter output drive shaft.

note.para: The SB 72-094 permits to dissociate the seal ring assembly item (40) into two parts:

unlitem.para: This allows to change only the preformed packing item (30) instead of changing all the whole.

l2item.para: Lubricate the re-usable or new 80111001-040 seal40 with CP2442engine oil and install it in the starter drive pad of the accessory gearbox.
Install the seal ring assembly (40) as follows:

l3item.para: If necessary, install a new 80111001-050 preformed packing30 on the support (20).
Lubricate the seal ring assembly (40) with CP2442engine oil.
Install the seal ring assembly (40) in the starter drive pad of the accessory gearbox.

l2item.para: Lubricate the output shaft splines of starter with CP2442engine oil.

Align locating dowel on starter (60) with locating hole on AGB housing. Engage the starter carefully in the drive pad to prevent damage to the O-ring (50). If necessary, turn the starter output drive shaft by hand to align mating splines.

caution.para: MAKE SURE THAT THE DUCTS ARE CORRECTLY CONNECTED WHEN YOU TORQUE THE COUPLINGS. IF THE DUCTS ARE NOT CORRECTLY CONNECTED THEY CAN LEAK AND CAUSE DAMAGE TO ADJACENT ELECTRICAL COMPONENTS.

l3item.para:
Put V-clamp (10) in position on the mating flanges. Lubricate the threads of clamp nut with CP2101 graphite grease. Install the nut and TORQUE
力矩值（Value of torque）
工具号（Equipment No.）
.

Put the V-clamp (70) and the air supply duct (80) in position on the starter air inlet orifice. Lubricate the threads of clamp nut with CP2101graphite grease . Install nut and TORQUE
力矩值（Value of torque）
工具号（Equipment No.）
.

l2item.para: Fill starter with CP2442 engine oil 12-13-80-610-00112-13-80-610-001-C.
